website_summaries.verdict: The modestly priced, solidly built Olympus VR-340 is not without its drawbacks, but is quite capable when used in the right lighting situations.
cons: Detail loss at higher ISO settings

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Olympus VR340
customer_reviews.text: Am super happy with this camera, I have several camera's ranging from very expensive with several lenses, tripods, filters etc to small SLR's this little guy takes the best photos, took photos of fireworks on the 4th, best I ever got, take lots of nature photos, great birds, a bumble bee in a flower, did I mention I really love it, never having had a digital camera before took me a while to get accustomed but now, its with me all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bak

customer_reviews.title: and the special effects options make it very fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: my 11 year old loves this camera, and the special effects options make it very fun for the whole family. Being able to plug the camera in to the TV is a great option for sharing the fun with a group. bought the protection plan with the camera but haven't had any issues yet, despite watching the poor thing crash to the floor from the hands of my beloved little one. The only issue we experienced up til now was temporary, and occurred because my son breathed into the lenses and fogged them up internally. Surprisingly, they didn't clear up very quickly, but after sitting overnight the picture quality was restored and no more blurry lens.
customer_reviews.author: pixie

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera after spending hours reading reviews on different cameras. Horrible blurry pictures right out of the box. Changing settings and lighting did nothing to improve photos. This camera also made subjects look really weird. Super fat faces on anyone in the right or left edges of the picture (on all settings). The distortion reaches almost a quarter of the way in so only the central half of the frame is correct. The really disappointing thing about it is that the reviews were positive and so completely incorrect. I bought it on Amazon new. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This Olympus VR-340 camera is easy to use and has lots of features. I'm not a photography enthusiast so I have mine set to automatically select the best "scene" setting for each shot, and that seems to work just fine. With 16 megapixel pictures and 10x optical zoom (31x digital zoom), you can't beat the price. My previous camera was also an Olympus and that one only lasted 3 years and then it died on me. I've only had this one for a few months so I can't give it 5 stars because I don't know whether or not I will have a similar longevity problem. For this price I felt it was worth giving Olympus another shot.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: In the day and age of camera phones this was a great gift for my 9 year old daughter who was wanting a camera and not ready to have a phone with a camera and an expensive service plan. I was surprised at how well it took pictures. It is small enough that she is able to carry it around and has brought it on many field trips with no problems. If you are looking for a point and shoot that takes great pictures and has some neat digital features this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: turtle

customer_reviews.title: They are an excellent little camera with quite a list of menu controls ...
customer_reviews.text: I and my family have four of these cameras, the first one costing me $180 at Walmart. This most recent one costing me $84 at Amazon. They are an excellent little camera with quite a list of menu controls to configure. Battery life is excellent, and the resolution can be set allowing some very good photography. ... mike
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Keehn

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my real estate business and it works great. Small enough to drop in a pocket when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have owned. I wore the first one out. I use this in my real estate business and it works great. Small enough to drop in a pocket when you need both hands, versatile enough to take wide angle and up close shots without moving around too much. The purple color also helps to find it when you drop it in high weeds or in bushes. As long as I do my part, the camera will do its part.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Olympus VR-340 16MP camera
customer_reviews.text: An amazing little camera. Well built. Nice finish. Feels secure in my hand thanks to the convenient little finger grip built into the front of the camera. Great for one hand operation. Can't buy a better camera for the money (about $78.oo) and it has a 10x zoom. Looks like Olympus is discontinuing this handy-dandy little model, though. Another neat feature -- thanks to Olympus' thinking is the camera battery is used in other Olympus cameras, including the vr-360, vr-470, sz-12 and sp720-uz. Each model offers different features and some make excellent complementary pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Spaghetti

customer_reviews.title: Very nice digital point-and-shoot!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this camera, especially with the 10x zoom. Shot a wedding with it as a backup and it performed well, even in low light outdoors at night. I would have given it 5 stars except for the fact that it does not zoom while recording videos. I guess I didn't read the technical data well enough before I ordered, but for the price this camera is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality over all. The image settings could use some help.
customer_reviews.text: I am please with the camera overall. I need to play a bit more with the image settings. The flash tends to wash out everything on the indoor setting. The oddly named "food" setting seems to work well for close up work. The video quality is good for outside work or very well lit indoor situations. I would have preferred an actual view finder as well as the LCD screen. Framing a shot at arms length with an LCD screen is a bit more difficult. However, these issues aside, this is a good camera for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter because at the time, it was only about 10$ more than the cheapie ones at walmart, and it was an actual brand name. I am so happy with this purchase. It is an excellent little camera. My husband likes it so much better than our much more expensive camera, he steals it from her all the time, not minding at all that it it fuschia!
customer_reviews.author: Althea Oleander

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera so far is very nice. I've had it a few days and have been taking random pictures of friends and my cats in the dark and in the light and it's doing just fine. It's nice and compact and easy to operate and charging is very simple. It's also very easy to put the pictures on my computer because my computer has a card reader slot. No formatting needed! So far i have no complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: can carry in pockets and got good zoom for better than phone and too big in size
customer_reviews.author: Mikie

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several Olympus cameras. Bought a VR-340 for my granddaughter. She loves it. This one that I purchased for ME must have been factory defective. Charged the battery. Camera would not turn on. Removed battery, rre-installed. It worked. Something fishy?? Then, camera would not focus. Depressed button half way. Still no focus. Played with it for two hours. Something definitely wrong wth this one. Returned it. So disappointed. Really wanted the pocket camera for business trip to DC. Didn''t have enough time to re-order.
customer_reviews.author: James Alekna

customer_reviews.title: Much more camera than I expected for the price !!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing! it has so many more features than I expected, I am just blown away! This thing would make an SLR user drool. I am so anxious to learn how to use all the special features. Just the point and shoot pictures I've taken have been amazing. I am so very glad the company my old camera was from, stopped supporting that model, which forced me into the market for a new one. I'm an Olympus fan from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Annette Holden

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife. Her old camera was not reliable any more often taking fuzzy pictures. So far we have been very pleased with this camera. It is easy to use, has a good selection of features and usually makes the right choices for exposure. When it doesn't you can see this immediately on it's excellent screen.I have printed enlargements up to 8 1/2 x 11 with excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Olympus VR340
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an economic small camera for my upcoming holidays. The camera is fine but for its 16megapixels I really expected much better results. The photos have visible pixels after zooming x3 or x4 which I don't find acceptable. For the price and my purpose it's fine, but still compared to my old iPhone 4S 8 megapixel camera this camera doesn't stand a chance...
customer_reviews.author: Anthie

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade an older digital camera and this Olympus turned out to be perfect. It is so much smaller and the view finder is three times the size of the older camera. It takes great pictures and is very easy to use. I really am happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this camera to both a beginner or someone looking to upgrade..
customer_reviews.author: DJC

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera so that I could become more familiar with Olympus products. I am NOT disappointed! It's a solidly built camera with many functions. Excellent low light picture quality. The automatic settings are great! I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone looking for a point and shoot. It is a bit larger than some point-and-shoot cameras, but still fits easily inside a pocket. Very easy upload of pictures to the computer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great camera, but buy a memory card!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures, but it only holds 9 pictures without a memory card, so buy one. I got a 32 GB card ($20), and it holds nearly 7000 pictures (fewer with videos too), so you could easily buy a much smaller card. It is more pink than red.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sutton

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: we had bought one and if failed after a few shooting / but my wife loved and Amazon was great on getting our money back / so we bought this one knock on wood this is great / we used it on a family picnic and the pictures turned out great con- the battery doesnt last long (100 pictures) so we bought more few more batteries for it / now she happy with it
customer_reviews.author: frank umstead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pix for a point-and-shoot.
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning how to use it. I bought an Olympus because it is small, has lots of features, and the brand has a solid reputation. The optics are very good; the camera is easy to operate. It is not too heavy which I appreciate as it is something I like to take along in my purse. The battery charges quickly and holds the charge for lots of picture taking.
customer_reviews.author: RitaRita

customer_reviews.title: some things are just great
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a compact, light camera to carry in her purse. That enables her to have an excellent camera at her fingertips at all times especially with the grandkids. We don't have a smartphone. We appreciate and want sharp crisp pictures with good color and the ability to have a good telephoto option. This camer is wonderful and just the right color.
customer_reviews.author: pete vasek

customer_reviews.title: Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Gave the Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Black) as a Birthday persent to my son to replace an older model Olympus that was stolen from Valley Fair. He was very pleased and the pictures he has taken are so clear and wow!! For the money, this little compact camera is the BEST choice!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: I like this Camera, But...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very is easy to use and takes great daytime pictures, but night pictures are a little blurry especially outdoor pics. I bought this camera to take with me hiking and it will be fine for that. I would be a little more disappointed if I were using it primarily for indoor or night pictures. I wouldn't trade it for my Olympus E-PL1. Oveall, this camera works fine for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: The Only Thing My...
customer_reviews.text: ...daughter asked for for her 6th birthday was this camera, and now she can't stop taking pictures and videos. We had to buy her a 32G card so she could document every. single. thing. she. does. Seriously though, I've used it on a few occasions and the features are awesome. Take black and white, sepia, silly photos...it's a rad cam.
customer_reviews.author: Lazzaro

customer_reviews.title: I'm sorry I missed my window to return
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes horrible blurry pictures. I'm just sorry I can no longer return it. I waited too long. I am now using my dad's old camera from 2008 that takes way better pictures and doesn't frustrate me so much. My X-Mas pictures are horrible and now I have nothing for that year. I watched the video and read the directions carefully and it still takes bad pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's me or the camera
customer_reviews.text: At my age, new-fangled electronic equipment is puzzling so the difficulties I found may not reflect the true state. I found it very difficult to find, relabel and edit the photos. There seems to be some jiggle on indoor shots, more than on my old camera. Compared to my neighbor's iPhone, the photos are sharper but darker.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: A nice big lens point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this camera for one day but I find it very easy to figure out. I got this camera because of the magic filters inside. The 10x lens is better than most point and shoots yet it is still pretty small. Some people may like that this camera can charge the battery while the battery is inside the camera.
customer_reviews.author: KSArnold

customer_reviews.title: The Olympus VR-340 is a Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: at a great price! Gorgeous shots, long lasting battery life and so easy to use it's nearly point-and-click. This is the first camera that I've been successful in using panoramic option. Having the instructions on-board as opposed to some thick little booklet to paw through is helping me get the most out of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I was stoked when this camera came. I didn't know a lot about how to use cameras, with control of ISO and how shutter speed worked. It took a while, but i figured it out. Great camera, I bought this camera and then ended up upgrading again, so i haven't used it a ton. The ISO is pretty sensitive, and can make a lot of noise in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Beentheredonethat

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket or bag camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera to throw in my bag and have when those unexpected times come up and I don't have my Nikon with me. It doesn't compare to my dslr camera, but for the price this is a great addition!!! I love the camera affects and the beauty fix is really too cool. I do wish it had the S and A modes, but for the price it's fine. I can take this places I don't risk my better camera and don't have to worry. I'm happy!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Nice Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: Does what I want when I don't want to carry my SLR 1. Focus easily even when zoomed. 2. VG quality pics 3. Good response time between pics so don't miss next shot Only negatives are that battery could stay charged longer & don't care about plugging in whole camera to recharge battery.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the price. My eight year old daughter bought this and she loves it! It is very easy for her to use and she loves the purple color. I am very impressed with the quality for the price that she paid for it. I would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Macro Feature!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been a work horse for my business. I would buy another if needed. The macro feature is what sold it for me as most are way more expensive for what this one does. Great product
customer_reviews.author: TRR

customer_reviews.title: It broke!!
customer_reviews.text: I got it on August 5th and it just broke!! When I'm not using it, I keep it in a drawer so I know I didn't do anything to it. I was recording a video and all of the sudden the screen is flashing and it's frozen. None of the buttons work and it won't turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Nell Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Really great camera
customer_reviews.text: The value of this camera is amazing! I am not any kind of great photographer, we just take pictures of family, vacations, etc. And this little camera is amazing for that. We haven't had a ton of use yet, but it seems to do the trick. The price is right, and the camera is beautiful! I love the pearl white.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: and it just doesn't work like I wanted it too
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a short time, I feel, and it just doesn't work like I wanted it too. Might be me though. The front eye doesn't close properly.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Fischetti

customer_reviews.title: Major Battery Issue (Or Worse)
customer_reviews.text: The camera seemed nice and swift with easy operating directions and clear instructions via online manual, HOWEVER after fully charging it, the camera's battery icon will indicate empty. I have repeatedly charged the battery to "full" and the same thing happens each time. I will be able to take one picture and the red Olympus will go dead. Therefore the battery will not hold a charge, or other issue. I wonder if any other folks have had this problem? Returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Hilton Dubovy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has more features and better specs than you would think for the money.I have been very pleased with how easy the camera is to use and the quality of the pictures.I received the camera in 3 days and in perfect condition so I am also very happy with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie.

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun camera to use for the most part but it lasted me less than a year and then it broke (the zoom went out and froze there unable to function anymore). I did use it often but wasn't careless with it.
customer_reviews.author: Artsy Abbi

customer_reviews.title: bought and given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the camera and I gave it to her. Winner, ME She is not a techie and has not asked me a single question about how to use it and is very happy with the results. Not a single complaint, Winner, Me!
customer_reviews.author: haroldgjr

customer_reviews.title: Replaced dead Canon
customer_reviews.text: Was on vacation when the canon I purchased from Amazon died after two uses. Broken lens motor. Needed a camera for the holiday vacation so I purchased this one and it's been great. Battery is ok I would get a back up to have on hand,
customer_reviews.author: SharBear

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a gift. It has been in use for about 7 months and no longer works. It was not dropped or abused in any way. I don't think this is a sufficient lifespan for a camera! Amazon will allow me to return for a refund but as I got this camera for a great price during holiday sales I will be unable to buy a new camera at this time of year for a similar price. Because it was purchased from a third-party seller I cannot do an exchange for a new camera which would be my preference.
customer_reviews.author: clouiseo

customer_reviews.title: Battery 's would not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one and the battery would not charge properly. Item was returned & replaced. The second one had the same problem. I did not replace the second one, but did return it and recieved my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Debora J. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Camera purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I got an identical camera stolen about 4 months ago. I bought two new cameras from other companies, that were much more expensive than my original VR-340. They were junk in comparison, so I bought a used VR-340 from Amazon, to replace my original, since Olympus no longer offers that model new. I am totally satisfied. The VR-340 is the best camera that I have ever used, besides those costing $thousands!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Camera at a great low price. Does so much...too much to mention. Highly recommend to anyone who wants a inexpensive outlay of cash and get a great quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: A. D.

customer_reviews.title: This camera is ok but not what I expected-the settings ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is ok but not what I expected-the settings take awhile to understand as well as use properly. A bit more complicated than a simple point and shoot, although there is an auto setting.
customer_reviews.author: sueribs

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like the actual camera, tho. the instructions for using it are poor and often totally obscure. It's twice as good at scenery shots as my Bloggie, but i need the next stage camera up with more powerful zoom. i'm really enjoying this tho..
customer_reviews.author: Frena Gray-Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandparents, and they absolutely loved it--easy to use for 78+ year olds; highly recommend--comes with charger and battery!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ryan

customer_reviews.title: My Third and Fourth Olympus...
customer_reviews.text: My third Olympus, it arrived with a software "hiccup", but has worked well since that first day. If I can keep from dropping my Olympus cameras into the lake, this one may go on for a very long time! Editing: Oops...This VR-340 has acquired another software "hiccup". It's back to working, but my confidence level has plummeted! It was satisfactorally replaced by the vendor within the 30-day warranty.. (2 Stars, but 5 for a prompt replacement). After dropping my fourth Olympus into the lake, I've now got a white one. :) (I take a lot of nature photographs from a boat). It came with obvious use on a tripod, but otherwise, can't be told from new...(5 stars—all good).
customer_reviews.author: Wolfeboronian

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a replacement for one lost. and is a better camera and the battery seems to last a very long time. I am able to go through pictures before I need to recharge. The steady hand feature is great for me for close up and distance pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Rtackett

customer_reviews.title: What was old is NEW again !
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to replace my old VR-340. Was comfortable with it......But really enjoy the new color....Red....makes it more fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Paige

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good camera Photos have good clarity both day and night I recommend it for any trip whether it's a water ride where you can buy a cover to protect it and it works great
customer_reviews.author: deysis possamai

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an easy camera to take to Disneyland, versus lugging my beloved Nikon D80. This new camera has now become my go-to picture taker. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: VR 340
customer_reviews.text: This camera was bought as a replacement for a damaged VR 320. It is obviously a cheaper made product and not as user friendly. Still, for the price, it is a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Not a fine pin point zoom, but whole picture.
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped with the 10x zoom, this camera would be good for bird photo's. But the zoom is the whole picture. It is good for outdoor pic's like when we were paddling and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: M Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Good camera as long as there is plenty of light
customer_reviews.text: Good camera as long as there is plenty of light. I use it for work and it fits in my pocket and takes good pictures easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My Second Olympus Point & Shoot (P&S)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase for someone ready to move beyond the AUTO shooting mode. The camera has nice ergonomics, is a tad bulky and has solid construction. I keep this camera with me all the time for a quick capture and as a backup. My first Olympus P&S was a VG120. The VR-340 has the quality I expected; great images (zoom is very good for a P&S), solidly built and excellent video.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M,

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I miss having a viewfinder but the wide screen makes viewing the image you are photographing somewhat less difficult and the ease of use is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: L Schulz

customer_reviews.title: good quality images
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, i found it in a good Price so i’m satisfied, its perfect for what i wanted, i know that this product would be as i imagined but its better. grat zooooooooooooooom
customer_reviews.author: Caminante583

customer_reviews.title: Olympus has me sold
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, quick start up, clear photos with great color. I wanted a high end camera that can fit in my pocket and be used on the go. I keep it in a neoprene case in my purse all the time and it is not even noticed in there. Holds a great charge too.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for my mom as she was looking for one to take on trips! She took it on a trip to England and Paris and also a couple of other countries. She loves it and uses it all the time. The picture quality is really good and the zoom is good, but if you are looking for something with a better zoom, there is another Olympus with a 24x zoom that might be a better fit. All in all, this camera is great if you are looking for something to take around on trips or on different occasions. Olympus definitely is a great brand for cameras!
customer_reviews.author: E Wally

customer_reviews.title: Replacing an older Nikon Coolpix 4300
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Nikon Coolpix 4300 several years ago for a lot more money than this camera cost, and this one is much better. technology advancement is great. Really like to 2 level close up mode. That is what I bought it for, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: FF_EMT1

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love all the options for a great price. My old camera didn't have a large LCD display. So lightweight and easy to carry. Would recommend a good carrying case for any camera. I use it mainly for hunting purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: this is was also a buy for my friend she doesn;t have amazon account so i ordered it for her but i belive she like it and she liked the price...
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for about two years now. I really like its features except I can not figure out how to force a flash. I love the color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a new digital camera for me. I bought it to travel to Italy. The pictures were sharp and clear. I had no problems using it. I am not a professional, but as an amateur, this worked great! It has many features I have not tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Really nice camera. Picture are clear and nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice camera. Picture are clear and nice. Love the fact that the battery is rechargeable. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry-Ann Neptune

customer_reviews.title: Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom is just what I was looking for. Easy to use right away. There are plenty of settings if you want to get a bit more technical.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Piper

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very easy to use. I love the zoom. Great price! The photos are not quite as good as my old Nikon, but the price was better. The Nikon didn't last long. We'll see how this one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a big camera and easy to carry with when out doing things
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my boyfriend he loves the way it takes pictures. Not a big camera and easy to carry with when out doing things.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Okay for some things
customer_reviews.text: I had a Canon before this camera. It hold to long before snapping and picture is not as crisp as with other cameras. I will hand this one down to my daughter and get another Canon.
customer_reviews.author: G. County

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE
customer_reviews.text: Works and sets up quick and easily, takes great pics and clear Videos. Also my wife loves the 3 inch screen to show all her grandkids pictures to all her friends she meets quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: tsr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with camera focusing after owning only a month. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: DPhillips

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It works great, and is easy to use. The pictures are clear and the color is good. It is a nice small, light size that makes it easy to carry and use.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle West

customer_reviews.title: love additional zoom
customer_reviews.text: olympus is great camera - red is easy to see and grab from bag with a second's notice - quality pics - long lasting battery
customer_reviews.author: chris fair

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Cam
customer_reviews.text: Everything one would ever need in a camera for non-professionals. No complaints at all. Shoots 720p video and sound, 4k pics no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ToughCustomer86

customer_reviews.title: great camera for a small price
customer_reviews.text: this camera is compact and very easy to use; i bought this to replace a much older Olympus camera (still working) and it was very easy to make the transition.
customer_reviews.author: Mature Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good value
customer_reviews.text: The camera is just the right size and takes great pictures. Great zoom lens. Easy to upload pictures and to recharge. Only drawback is that the memory card keeps un-formatting, causing me to lose some of those great pictures, but I'm not sure if the issue is with the camera or the memory card itself. Good bang for buck.
customer_reviews.author: pplhayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for price. Many features. All you need for a camera unless you are a professional sports photographer.
customer_reviews.author: W. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, it takes great pictures and has great instructions on the cd that are easy to understand. There is even a help menu on the camera, if you forget how to do some things. I like the 10x zoom also. I am going to take wonderful pictures of my new grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is all I expected and more. Still learning all the little nuances this little gem has for use. 10X zoom is also a huge plus !
customer_reviews.author: hip112778

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I wasn't too sure about the picture quality until I looked at the pictures on my computer monitor. Beautiful. Fairly easy menu to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA FOR HE NON PROFESSIONAL!
customer_reviews.text: A great point & shoot camera for the average person!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter. Need to remember to purchase a SD card too, as this only holds 5 pictures in internal memory.
customer_reviews.author: CycloneFan

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Camera. I use a Camera Very Frequently and have in the past bought other brands, well I came back to Olympus and this Camera I am very pleased with. Easy to use, Takes nice pictures. I got a great Price and Very Very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent automatic camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has performed very well, but as with most digital cameras, the menu system leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: great features, crisp photos
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my camera for a few months now and I love it! The picture quality is way better than the $300 nikon cool pic I purchased 4 years ago. This is a simple model, but the features are what sold me at the end. The beauty feature is my favorite - my girlfriends and I use the heck out of that feature! It takes great video too. I plan on taking this to Europe in a few months (part of the reason I sought out a new camera) and I trust that it won't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, many features, great zoom in a pocket size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's easy to use, fun to use and takes great pictures. It's the first Olympus I've owned and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J. McMahan

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I do love this camera and am still learning more and more about it. I am one who takes my camera everywhere and this is ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Frances J. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but good for the money. Colors are accurate and the 10x zoom is very nice. Buy better if you want to enlarge your pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sanford12

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small camera that I could carry around in my purse and I am more than pleased with this one. The picture quality is great and it's very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I returned it, it was broken when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: the recipient was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, the recipient was very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hope

customer_reviews.title: love this camera so far
customer_reviews.text: the last camera i got was the worst one i have ever seen. so i was skeptical that this one will live up to the description. it more than does. i really love it
customer_reviews.author: rlynnzzzzz@outlook.com

customer_reviews.title: Best small camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal ! Best viewing screen, pixels, and zoom for under 100 bucks. Can't go wrong buying this one !
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera, which takes great shots with a lot of features.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and easy to find when I lay it down.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with the pictures I have taken with this camera. They come out sharp. Truly like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Digges

product_meta.title: Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFull featured with a big 10X optical zoom, the VR-340 packs loads of technology into a small body. Whether it's shooting crystal clear photos or taking high-quality HD Video, you'll never miss a moment

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Full featured with a big 10X optical zoom, the VR-340 packs loads of technology into a small body. Whether it’s shooting crystal clear photos or taking high-quality HD Video, you’ll never miss a moment. The Magic Art Filter feature will let you capture creative shots, and the Dual Image Stabilization means you’ll get a sharp shot in any situation. 

Olympus VR-340 Highlights 

10X ULTRA WIDE-ANGLE ZOOM LENS
A big zoom that fits right in your pocket. The 10x zoom lets you get incredibly close to your subject, while the wide-angle lens lets your capture everyone and everything in your shot! 

MAGIC ART FILTERS – STILL & VIDEO
Express your creativity with up to 12 special effects for your photos & HD movies. Olympus' Magic Art Filters infuse familiar scenes with new and unexpected moods ranging from the exciting to the serene and from the whimsical to the mysterious. Choose from Pop Art, Pin Hole, Drawing, Fish Eye, Soft Focus, Punk, Watercolor, Miniature, Sparkle, Reflection, Dramatic and Fragmented. (Effects vary by model and may reduce image size.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars310 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
